PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-00662018-02-02,  TBS,  OAG,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditor and Joint Auditor General of Canada for the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) DELOITTE LLP of Montreal, Quebec as AUDITOR OF THE PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2018; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR OF THE PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
